name: Bolognese Sauce
recipeIngredient: 300 ml (1/2 pint) red or white wine,
400 g (13  oz) can of chopped tomatoes,
recipeInstructions: 1. Melt the butter with the oil in a large heavy based saucepan and gently fry the onion and celery for 5 minutes.
2. Add the garlic, beef and the skinned sausage, and cook until they are lightly coloured, breaking up the mince and sausage with a wooden spoon.

3. Add the wine and allow it to bubble for 2 minutes until slightly evaporated. Add the tomatoes, sugar, bay leaves, oregano, tomato paste, and a little salt and pepper, and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat to it’s lowest setting, cover the pan with a lid and cook for 1 hour, stirring occasionally, until thick and pulpy.
